summary: this fixes the exit place in dragonborn dlc
descriptionHtml:
Ohai :)

I was playing dragonborn for a long time,,
 and then i notice the exit for raven rock through other place is not good.
 i have a horse and i tried it to go there but the horse won\'t fit, even if im not in the horse the horse wont go through.

This fix is it ..

i have screenshot of my horse that can go through the bridge
Hope it works on you :)

Credits to :

Bethesda/skyrim 
SkyrimNexusmod
author: UnknownHuman
